LightningComponentBundle.description: This help users select and upload a file.

property.name: fieldId
property.label: Field Id
property.description: Field Id - must be unique to this process

property.name: acceptedFormats
property.label: Accepted File Formats
property.description: A valid case-insensitive filename extension, starting with a period (.) character. For example: .jpg, .pdf, or .doc.

property.name: maxFileSizeInMB
property.label: Max Files Size Allowed (in MB)
property.description: The maximum file soze allowed to upload in MB (Max Value should not be greater thna Salesforce Standards)

property.name: required
property.label: Required?
property.description: Is this required to submit the form?

property.name: useApexToSaveFile
property.label: Use Apex Function to Save File
property.description: True - If you want to use predefined apex funtion to save the file without any event. Record Id of parent is required for this.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id where File needs to be attached
property.description: Record Id of Parent Record to save the file

property.name: filesUploaded
property.label: (Output Only Variable) Uploaded Files Output Data
property.description: (Output Only Variable) Uploaded Files Output Data
